description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/fortnite/

On October 2 jump into the new Demon Rush limited-time mode to take on the demons to seal the honmoon! The action doesn’t stop there, try out the new Rumi's Empowered Sword, Zoey's Golden Bubble Shield, take a snack break with Mira's X-tra Spicy Ramyeon, and teleport around the Island with the Derpy Teleporter Mask in Battle Royale, Blitz, and Reload. Check out HUNTR/X in the Item Shop!

title: KPop Demon Hunters Takes Over Fortnite | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/ghost-of-yotei/

Available on PS5® October 2, 2025. 
Pre-order Now or Learn More: https://www.playstation.com/games/gho... 

Discover a bold, new story of a warrior in Japan who is on a mission of vengeance all her own. 

Set 300 years after the critically acclaimed Ghost of Tsushima, Ghost of Yōtei is standalone experience set in 1600s rural Japan. The story follows a haunted, lone mercenary named Atsu. Thirsty for revenge, she travels through the beautiful, rugged landscapes of northern Japan, hunting those who killed her family many years earlier.

#ps5 #ps5games #ghostofyotei
title: Ghost of Yōtei - Accolades Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/zenless-zone-zero/

(One) little star, up high
(Two) little stars, float by
(Three) little stars, it's time to search and find!
(The) lonely moon says/ she sings in a hollow tree
(The) lonely bird says / she hides where no one sees
(The) lonely sea says / she carries something sweet
Before we reach three / the stars are fast asleep

"Got you at last... my dream."

#ps5 #ps5games #zzzero #zenlesszonezero
title: Zenless Zone Zero - "Memories of Dreams Bygone" Version 2.3 Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games

title: Anima Gate of Memories I&II Remaster - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013882

Two decades after the chilling horrors of the past, the year is 2006, and the abandoned streets of Old Diamond Drive lie shrouded in eerie mystery. Once a vibrant neighborhood, it’s now the heart of chilling urban legends whispered across town. 16 year old Justin, having lost a bet to his friend Matthew, accepts a daring challenge: spend a single night among the remains of this shell of a once thriving community. Armed with only a camcorder and a flashlight, he steps into the darkness, unaware of the nightmare awaiting him. As the shadows close in, Justin discovers he’s trapped on Old Diamond Drive... and he’s not alone. To survive, he must confront the horrors face to face and challenge the unknown figure lurking in the obscurity of the dark.

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: The Obsessive Shadow Chapter 2 - Official Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009333

😱 Dark Atlas: Infernum launches November 14th!
The psychological survival horror from Night Council Studio and Selecta Play is set to drag players into a twisted nightmare this fall.

👁️ Play the free demo now on PlayStation 5 and get a first look at the horrors that await.
Step into the role of Natalia Asensio, Grand Master of a secret esoteric order, as she awakens in a collapsing world filled with interdimensional terrors. Drugged, disoriented, and haunted by cryptic voices, Natalia must survive physical and psychological threats where each step leads closer to madness… or salvation.

🔥 Key Features:
Psychological survival horror with a gripping narrative
Immersive first-person gameplay full of disturbing detail
Stealth-focused encounters—hide, don’t fight
Interconnected indoor and outdoor areas to explore
Chilling soundscapes and visuals that blur reality and nightmare
🗓️ Release Date: November 14th, 2025
💀 Wishlist now and pla
title: Dark Atlas: Infernum - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games
